Chinese: 这部<movie/TV series/animation/game, etc.>的导演是<specific name>吗？
这部<movie/TV series/animation/game, etc.>的标题是<specific title>吗？
这部<movie/TV series/animation/game, etc.>来自<specific country or region>吗？
这个人是<specific movie/TV series/animation/game, etc.>的角色吗？
这张图片中的角色是在这部<movie/TV series/animation/game, etc.>里的名字是<specific name>吗？
这张<海报/照片/插图等>描述的是<specific movie/TV series/animation/game, etc.>吗？
这幅插图是<specific movie/TV series/animation/game, etc.>的宣传图片？
这个场景属于<specific movie/TV series/animation/game, etc.>的吗？
图片中<movie/TV series/animation/game, etc.>的主要角色是<specific name>吗？
English: Is the director of this <movie/TV series/animation/name, etc.> <specific name>?
Is the title of this <movie/TV series/animation/name, etc.> <specific title>?
Does this <movie/TV series/animation/name, etc.> come from <specific country or region>?
Is this person the character of <specific movie/TV series/animation/name, etc.>?
Is the character in this picture named <specific name> in this <movie/TV series/animation/name, etc.>?
Does this <poster/photo/illustration> describe <specific movie/TV series/animation/name, etc.>?
Is this illustration a promotional image for <specific movie/TV series/animation/name, etc.>?
Does this scene belong to <specific movie/TV series/animation/name, etc.>?
Is the main character of <movie/TV series/animation/name, etc.> in the picture <specific name>?

Chinese: 这部<movie/TV series/animation/game, etc.>的导演是谁？
这部<movie/TV series/animation/game, etc.>的标题是什么？
这部<movie/TV series/animation/game, etc.>来自哪个国家或地区？
这个人是哪个<movie/TV series/animation/game, etc.>角色？
这张图片中的角色是在这部<movie/TV series/animation/game, etc.>里的名字是什么？
这张<海报/照片/插图等>描述的是哪部<movie/TV series/animation/game, etc.>？
这张<海报/照片/插图等>是从哪里获取的？
这幅插图是什么<movie/TV series/animation/game, etc.>的宣传图片？
这个场景属于哪部<movie/TV series/animation/game, etc.>？
这是哪部<movie/TV series/animation/game, etc.>的剧照？
图片中<movie/TV series/animation/game, etc.>的主要角色是什么？
English: Who is the director of this <movie/TV series/animation/game, etc.>?
What is the title of this <movie/TV series/animation/game, etc.>?
Which country or region does this <movie/TV series/animation/game, etc.> come from?
Which <movie/TV series/animation/game, etc.> character is this person?
What is the name of the character in this picture in this <movie/TV series/animation/game, etc.>?
Which <movie/TV series/animation/game, etc.> does this <poster/photo/illustration, etc.> describe?
Where can I get this <poster/photo/illustration, etc.>??
What <movie/TV series/animation/game, etc.> promotional image is this illustration?
Which <movie/TV series/animation/game, etc.> does this scene belong to?
What is the main character in the <movie/TV series/animation/game, etc.> in the picture?
